Hello there, haven't seen you in ages!
Great to see you again, you're looking really well!
Still working in that coffee shop?
Still trying to be an actor?
So Hollywood hasn't called in yet?
Still living in that little flat?
How about you, you still work in that fast food place?
No, stopped that a long time ago.
I'm working in the City now, financial industries.
Are you still sharing that house with all those other people?
I bought a big house with four bedrooms and a garden, the works.
Listen, we should get together for a drink sometime, catch up.
